page.title: 14Industry in Nether Kellet
page.content: A major{industry}in the area is quarrying. The quarries include: 'Wimpey' which is 200 feet deep, 'Back Lane' which is 150 feet deep, 'High Road' which is 100 feet deep and 'Tarmac' which is 200 feet deep all the way round. 'Tarmac' makes tarmac, 'High Road' makes breeze blocks, slabs and paving and 'Wimpey' and 'Back Lane' produce tarmac and stone. At each quarry they have shelters for the man who blasts. The time for each blast is always from 12 noon to 1 p.m. We can hear the blast from our school which is about half a mile from the nearest quarry. Much machinery is used including: JCB (diggers), hoppers, a crane bomb, a crusher, dumpers, loading shovels and diggers. The crushers are machines that crush the blocks into the sizes which are required.
